actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award grants and contracts to establish domestic violence community response teams and a technical assistance center to address the development and support of such community response teams, and for other purposes.
short_title: Domestic Violence Community Response Team Act of 1995

summary.text: Domestic Violence Community Response Team Act of 1995 - Prescribes guidelines under which the Secretary of Health and Human Services is authorized to: (1) award grants for community response teams to assist in domestic violence prevention; and (2) award contracts for technical assistance centers. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Domestic Violence Community Response Team Act of 1995

A bill to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award grants and contracts to establish domestic violence community response teams and a technical assistance center to address the development and support of such community response teams, and for other purposes.
